website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding soundbar for turning a TV room into a home cinema that doubles as a music-casting behemoth.
pros: Supports multiple streaming protocols (WiFi, Bluetooth, AirPlay, etc.)
cons: Included remote is inadequate (control via smartphone app is a must)
The expansive feature set is reflected in the price

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: It has been less than a year and this product has ceased to work. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great sound !
customer_reviews.text: great sound, very pretty design , well packed , the only bad thing is that de interface is ver unstable , the app to control multiform is very confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Mikelan

customer_reviews.title: First Impression
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up tonight and well not really impressed for the $$. Was mostly a music test tonight and sub was mmm ok. Will do some tweaking tomorrow and see. Replacing an old Panasonic SU-HTB770. Yea no blue tooth and the input switch is a pain but would think this would be night and day.
customer_reviews.author: Redoc

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This became the sound system for my new 65" TV. Great value and great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Nestle

customer_reviews.title: Weak Subwoofer
customer_reviews.text: The sound bar performs as expected however, the subwoofer is weak compared to JBL.
customer_reviews.author: michael s.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great for the living room. Just right about of bass as well.
customer_reviews.author: Yaw Sapon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought buying a nice speaker system would be worth it, but I can't even tell the difference between the speakers and $150 dollar speakers
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love it. Bought another one as this is that good.
customer_reviews.author: mehrman53

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: After endless research we decided to but this, and it was great value for the money. Easy to install and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Julita Jasinski

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. why did they give you a remote? Just use the app since there is no screen on the sound bar. Not sure it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the music
customer_reviews.text: Made a difference in my large Family Room. Great for the music channel
customer_reviews.author: gary cancro

customer_reviews.title: The sound was ok but you have to push the ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound was ok but you have to push the system to get a sort of theater type sound. I could not get the music cast, multi room or alexia to work with my Wi Fi. or cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Al Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: and wireless sub synched quickly and easily. I can't get my iPhone to connect to ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound quality, and wireless sub synched quickly and easily. I can't get my iPhone to connect to it through Bluetooth, and the onscreen menu seems dated. Firmware update was not a good experience, with poor progress communication, and a hang that left me unsure if the unit was bricked. I am not using the MusicCast feature, so can't comment on that. Definitive and LG soundbars I have heard seem to be slightly better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a $300 Sony sound bar/sub woofer combo and the difference is remarkable. If fills the room with clear, accurate audio. In movie mode, the 7.1 system does a great job of creating a surround effect without the need for rear speakers. When watching a TV show, the clear voice is phenomenal, and music rivals my high end Yamaha receiver/1000 dollar JBL combo. The bluetooth pairing is fast and easy, with no noticeable lag when playing music or listening to a podcast from my iPhone. This system checks all of the boxes; you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Burns

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The wireless sub-woofer has stopped working and I have only had the product for just over 6 months. I expect a lot more use for the money spent. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Crippen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound bar! Going to download the upgrade via website based on people’s info.
customer_reviews.author: Farmerdan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Keeping!
customer_reviews.text: Great soundbar, like it a lot better than the Bose 300 and sub. Good quality and a great value for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bradley

product_meta.title: Yamaha YAS-706 MusicCast Wireless Multiroom Sound Bar, Works with Alexa
product_meta.description: Escape into your favorite movies and TV shows like never before. This high-performance sound bar delivers the fidelity, depth and spine-tingling sonic details that put you in the middle of the action. It's also a powerful streaming music system that gives you access to all of your content using your home Wi-Fi network.
feature_bullets: Works with Alexa for voice control (Alexa device sold separately)
HDMI inputs with 4K Ultra HD pass-through for best performance
Slim design fits in front of TV or can be wall-mounted
Access to your music library, Pandora, Spotify, Rhapsody and more
Versatile connectivity - Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, AirPlay and Spotify Connect

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
